instructions: Please provide this satisfaction survey to patients at every appointment or at the delivery appointment only.
overview: This is a Patient Satisfaction Questionnaire (PSQ) provided by the American Board for Certification in Orthotics, Prosthetics & Pedorthics, Inc.
population: The intended population includes the following: Orthosis Users and Prosthesis Users.
references: 1. Â© American Board for Certification in Orthotics, Prosthetics & Pedorthics, Inc. 2014.
score_calculation:
Scoring is calculated as a percentage of best possible score.

Example score calculation:
How satisfied are you with your device(s)?
Satisfied = 100%, Mostly satisfied = 75%, Neutral = 50%, Mostly dissatisfied = 25%, Dissatisfied = 0%

Were the instructions regarding the use and care of your device(s) useful?
Very useful = 100%, Somewhat useful = 50%, Not useful = 0%, I didn't get instructions = N/A

If a patient responded "Mostly satisfied" and "Somewhat useful", the resulting total score is 62.5% (average of 75% and 50%).
If a patient responded "Mostly satisfied" and "I didn't get instructions", the resulting total score is 75%.
score_interpretation:
0% = Lowest possible score (undesirable)
100% = Highest possible score (desirable)
